name: 黃有評
objective:
機率空間；組合分析；隨機變數；期望值與慣矩；聯合分佈隨機變數；慣矩母函數及特徵函數；大數法則及中央極限定理；隨機漫步及帕森程序。
The goal of probability is to develop the ability for undergraduate students to construct and analyze probabilistic models in a manner that combines intuitive understanding and mathematical precision.
schedule:
Week 1.Introduction
Week 2~3.Sample space and probability
Week 4~5.Discrete random variables
Week 6~7.General random variables
Week 8.Mid-term exam.
Week 9~11.Further topics on random variables
Week 12~13.The Bernoilli and Poisson processes
Week 14~15.Morkov chains
Week 16~17.Limit theormes
Week 18.Final exam.
materials:
textbook:
D.P. Bertsekas and J.N. Tsitsiklis, Introduction to Probability, Athena Scientific, Belmont, MA. 全華圖書代理
